header_functionality.steps:
1. Navigate to https://shegadelivery.com/
2. Verify the page loads completely.
3. Check that all logos and images are loaded successfully without broken icons.
header_functionality.expected_result: The website loads the entire page completely, and all logos and images loaded successfully.

header_functionality.steps:
1. Automatic: Allow browser location permissions when prompted to verify the 'Delivering to' address updates automatically.
2. Manual: Click on the address, enter a specific location (e.g., 'Bole'), select from suggestions, and verify the address updates.
header_functionality.expected_result: The location has automatic detection and manual submission working correctly.

header_functionality.steps:
1. Click the search (magnifying glass) icon in the top right header.
2. Type a keyword (e.g., 'Pizza').
3. Press Enter.
header_functionality.expected_result: Search input opens/focuses. Search results related to the keyword are displayed.

header_functionality.steps: 1. Click the 'Sign In' button in the top right header.
header_functionality.expected_result: User is redirected to the Login/Registration page.

header_functionality.steps: 1. Click the yellow 'Cart' button in the top right header.
header_functionality.expected_result: Cart drawer opens or navigates to the Cart page.

authentication_and_profile.steps:
1. Navigate to Sign In page.
2. Method 1: Enter valid phone number and OTP/password.
3. Method 2: Click 'Sign in with Google' and complete the flow.
4. Verify successful login for both methods.
authentication_and_profile.expected_result: Both Phone and Google sign-in methods authenticate the user successfully and redirect to the dashboard/home.

authentication_and_profile.steps:
1. After login, click on the User Profile icon/name in header.
2. Verify the dropdown contains: 'Profile', 'My Orders', 'Logout'.
3. Click each link to verify navigation.
authentication_and_profile.expected_result: Dropdown appears correctly. Links navigate to Profile, Orders, and Logout triggers logout action.

authentication_and_profile.steps:
1. Navigate to 'Profile' section.
2. Check for display of Name, Email ID, and Phone Number.
authentication_and_profile.expected_result: Name, Email, and Phone are displayed correctly matching the logged-in user's details.

authentication_and_profile.steps:
1. Go to 'Address' tab/section.
2. Click to Add or Edit an address.
3. Verify Map interface loads.
4. Enter text in 'Complete Address' and 'Landmark'.
5. Select label: 'Home', 'Work', or 'Others'.
6. Click 'Save Address'.
authentication_and_profile.expected_result: Map allows pin selection. Text inputs accept data. Address types are selectable. Address saves successfully.

authentication_and_profile.steps:
1. Click 'Wallet' link in sidebar/menu.
2. Click 'Membership' link in sidebar/menu.
3. Verify page content loads for each.
authentication_and_profile.expected_result: Wallet displays balance/history. Membership page displays tier info/benefits.

order_management.steps:
1. Navigate to 'My Orders'.
2. Verify tabs for 'Active', 'Completed', and 'Cancelled' exist.
3. Click each tab to view orders.
order_management.expected_result: Tabs switch the view to show relevant orders. Order cards are displayed with Restaurant Name, Price, and Status.

order_management.steps:
1. Locate an Active order.
2. Verify buttons: 'Track Order', 'Call Store', 'Help'.
3. Click 'Call Store' (verify prompt).
4. Click 'Help' (verify modal/chat).
order_management.expected_result: Buttons are actionable. Call prompt appears. Help section opens.

order_management.steps:
1. Click 'Track Order' on an active order.
2. Verify a new page opens showing the map with route (Source to Destination).
3. Check for Order Details, Store Address, and Delivery Address.
order_management.expected_result: Tracking page loads with Map, Driver/Order status, and correct addresses.

order_management.scenario: Verify Navigation to Store from Order
order_management.steps: 1. In 'My Orders', click the Store Name (e.g., 'MNC - Ethiopia').

service_cards.steps:
1. Locate the 'Food' card with the burger/drink icon.
2. Click on the card.
service_cards.expected_result: Navigates to the food delivery section or filters restaurants for food.

service_cards.steps:
1. Locate the 'Grocery' card with the bag icon.
2. Click on the card.
service_cards.expected_result: Navigates to the grocery section or filters stores for groceries.

service_cards.steps:
1. Locate the 'Pickup and Drop' card with the delivery hands icon.
2. Click on the card.
service_cards.expected_result: Navigates to the pickup & drop service page.

categories_and_filters.steps:
1. Scroll to the 'Categories' section.
2. Click on the 'Burger' icon.
3. Click on the 'Pizza' icon.
categories_and_filters.expected_result: The restaurant list updates to show only relevant results for the selected category.

categories_and_filters.steps:
1. Locate the filter bar below categories.
2. Click 'Free Delivery'.
3. Click 'Top Rated'.
4. Click 'Favourite'.
5. Click 'Budget friendly'.
6. Click 'Offers'.
7. Click 'Veg'.
categories_and_filters.expected_result: Clicking each filter correctly updates the displayed list of restaurants based on the criteria.

restaurant_listings.steps:
1. Scroll to the 'Nearby Restaurants' section.
2. Verify that restaurant cards (e.g., 'MNC - Ethiopia', 'Shega cuisine') are visible with images.
restaurant_listings.expected_result: Restaurant name, image, and meta-data (rating, time) are clearly visible.

restaurant_listings.steps: 1. Click on any restaurant card (e.g., 'MNC - Ethiopia').
restaurant_listings.expected_result: User is redirected to the detailed Menu page for that restaurant.

promotions_area.steps:
1. Scroll to the yellow promotion banner.
2. Verify the illustration and text 'Simple way to Download the Shega Delivery'.
3. Check if the QR Code is visible.
promotions_area.expected_result: Banner elements are properly aligned and visible. QR Code is scan-able.

promotions_area.steps: 1. Verify the checkmarks for 'Get Live Order Tracking' and 'Get Latest Feature Updates'.
promotions_area.expected_result: Text and icons are visible and correct.

footer_navigation.expected_result: Each link opens the correct informational page.
